thread.title: We’re Celebrating Sabyasachi’s Birthday With Our Fave Throwbacks
thread.title_full: We’re Celebrating Sabyasachi’s Birthday With Our Fave Throwbacks

author: Sanaa Shah
title: We’re Celebrating Sabyasachi’s Birthday With Our Fave Throwbacks
text:
A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Nov 23, 2016 at 3:19am PST 
It was on this day, 43 years ago India got one of its best fashion designers. Happy Birthday, Sabyasachi ! Thank you for coming into this world and showering us with the best of Bridal wear. Apart from his Bridal range, his casual Indian wear is equally stunning. From red carpet events to weddings to parties; this genius manages to top every genre in fashion. 
On his birthday lets all take a moment to see all his stunning designs that even celebrities couldn’t resist: 1. Deepika Padukone A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Jun 25, 2016 at 10:05pm PDT 2. Katrina Kaif A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Sep 19, 2016 at 8:40am PDT 3. Anushka Sharma A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Jun 21, 2016 at 3:26am PDT 4. Kareena Kapoor Khan A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Aug 28, 2016 at 6:01am PDT 5. Karisma Kapoor A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Sep 24, 2016 at 7:55pm PDT 6. Sonam Kapoor A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Dec 9, 2015 at 12:38am PST 7. Kangana Ranaut A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Aug 10, 2016 at 5:03pm PDT 8. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on May 28, 2016 at 12:44pm PDT 9. Kajol A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Sep 23, 2015 at 6:47am PDT 10. Sridevi A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Jan 26, 2016 at 1:09am PST 11. Divya Khosla Kumar A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Aug 29, 2016 at 4:22am PDT 12. Asin A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Jan 23, 2016 at 7:45pm PST 13. Bipasha Basu Grover A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on May 2, 2016 at 2:50am PDT 14. Kajal Aggarwal A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Aug 29, 2016 at 3:55am PDT 15. Tamannah Bhatia A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Nov 9, 2015 at 3:21am PST 
The list was never ending but we had to draw a line. Hope you guys had fun reminiscing his creations. Don’t forget to send him some birthday wishes in the comments below! 0 TAGS
